snippet: The move by the Agriculture Department is part of an effort to regulate puppy mills that began last year with rules requiring licenses for some breeders.
lead_paragraph: The move by the Agriculture Department is part of an effort to regulate puppy mills that began last year with rules requiring licenses for some breeders.

headline.main: Government Sets Rules for Imported Puppies
headline.print_headline: USDA: Puppy imports must be healthy, 6 months old
